name: Pineapple Mint Spritzer
description: Simple, refreshing and wonderfully bubbly, made in 5 min with just 3 ingredients. It doesn’t get any easier than this!

recipeInstructions.text: Using a pitcher, mix pineapple and orange juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a pitcher, mix pineapple and orange juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour pineapple-orange mixture into serving glasses until half full. Fill glasses with Moscato.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour pineapple-orange mixture into serving glasses until half full. Fill glasses with Moscato.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, garnished with mint, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, garnished with mint, if desired.
